name: E-commerce Website
description: A fully functional e-commerce website built for a fictional clothing brand. Users can browse products, add items to cart, and checkout securely.

name: Task Management App
description: A mobile application for creating and managing tasks with deadlines, priorities, and progress tracking features.

name: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing real-time data from various sources. Users can filter and customize data views.

name: Blog with Content Management System (CMS)
description: A personal blog website with a user-friendly CMS for adding, editing, and publishing blog posts.

name: Social Media Clone
description: A social media platform prototype focusing on connecting users with similar interests and allowing them to share content.

name: Machine Learning Model for Image Classification
description: A machine learning model trained to identify different objects in images with high accuracy.

name: API for Currency Conversion
description: A RESTful API that allows users to convert between different currencies with live exchange rates.

name: Chrome Extension for Productivity
description: A Chrome extension that helps users stay focused and manage their time efficiently while browsing.

name: Bug Tracking System
description: An internal web application for developers to report, track, and manage bugs efficiently.

name: Content Management System (CMS) for a Non-Profit
description: A user-friendly CMS for a non-profit organization to manage website content, volunteer opportunities, and donation platforms.

name: Chatbot for Customer Service
description: A natural language processing (NLP) powered chatbot to answer customer queries and provide basic troubleshooting steps.

name: Progressive Web App (PWA) Game
description: A PWA game that can be played online and offline, offering a smooth and engaging user experience across devices.
